tool_description: Unofficial API for scraping Play Store
name: Play Store
title: Play Store

api_list.name: Top Grossing Apps
api_list.description: Returns a list of the top grossing apps

api_list.name: Top Free Apps
api_list.description: Returns a list of the top free apps

api_list.name: Top Paid Games
api_list.description: Returns a list of the top paid games

api_list.name: Top Free Games
api_list.description: Returns a list of the top free games

api_list.name: Reviews
api_list.description: Get reviews for a provided app

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: enum for sorting reviews. Use new, top, or relevance

api_list.name: Top Paid Apps
api_list.description: Returns a list of the top paid apps

api_list.name: Top Grossing Games
api_list.description: Returns a list of the top grossing games

api_list.name: Similar Apps
api_list.description: Returns a list of apps similar to the provided app.

api_list.name: Apps by Developer
api_list.description: Returns a list of applications published by the provided developer.

api_list.name: Search Suggestions
api_list.description: Get a list of related search terms for the provided query.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Returns a list of applications found by a search query. Pass your search term as the query parameter q.

api_list.name: Categories
api_list.description: Get category codes for the Play Store.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://play-store2.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "play-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Application Information
api_list.description: Get Details about an application from the Play Store
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://play-store2.p.rapidapi.com/app/com.zhiliaoapp.musically"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "play-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://play-store2.p.rapidapi.com/app/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "play-store2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
